name: First Utah Bank Business Credit Card
ongoing_apr: 13.49% APR for purchases and balance transfers; 19.49% APR for cash advances

rewards.description: 1.00% cash back on all purchases, credited quarterly

credits_and_benefits: Cash back credited quarterly on the 15th day of the month following quarter end
Card billing cycle date is the 1st of each month
Cards do not need to be paid to zero monthly
Baggage Delay Reimbursement up to $100/day for up to 3 days (delay > 4 hours)
Accident Insurance – $500,000 accidental death and dismemberment
Roadside Assistance – $69.95 set price per call (towing, tire change, jump start, lockout, fuel delivery, winching)
Rental Vehicle Damage Waiver – collision or theft
Cellular Telephone Protection (cell phone bill must be paid with card)
Damage or theft of eligible cellphone reimbursed
Purchase Security – protects new retail purchases (Regulation E/VISA dispute)
